content: i designed this vibrant textured square for the october 2025 bam cal hosted on ravelry this square is inspired and named after grandma tala i hope it brings you joy and warmth on a cozy autumn night i have written the pattern using 5 colours but you could adapt as you wish and create in any colour combination in dk yarn yarnsmiths create dk - 100% acrylic and 4mm hook the square measures 10 when blocked i made another with yarnsmiths merino dk yarn slightly finer and a 3 5mm hook which measured 8 hand dyed sock yarn & 3mm hook measured just over 6
